data.title: Kyle Luttinen - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description: Kyle Luttinen (2) Forward  - (2023-24): Appeared in 31 games for the Falcons … made 13 starts … averaged 24.9 minutes per game … scored 289 points … averaged 9.3
data.text:
2023-24 Men's Basketball Roster

Choose a Player:

Wilson Wong / Simon Fraser

2 Kyle Luttinen

Position Forward

Height 6-7

Weight 190

Class Graduate Student

Hometown Seattle, Wash.

Highschool Roosevelt High School

Bio

Stats

Biography

(2023-24): Appeared in 31 games for the Falcons … made 13 starts … averaged 24.9 minutes per game … scored 289 points … averaged 9.3 points per game … shot 42.2 percent from the field … made 38.6 percent of his 3-points attempts … shot 61.5 percent from the free throw line … pulled down 124 rebounds … averaged four rebounds per game … dished out 31 assists … averaged one assist per game … nabbed 22 steals … blocked 14 shots … played a season-high 37 minutes against Chico State (11/11) … scored a season-high 18 points against Daemen (11/05) … pulled in a season-high eight rebounds against CWU (3/07) … dished out a season-high three assists against Simon Fraser (2/10)

Prior to SPU – Played four years of varsity basketball at Roosevelt High School under head coach Ben Scheffler … scored 51 points in a single game as a junior … Second Team All-Metro as a senior … selected to the Washington 3A All Star Team … also played four years of varsity golf … earned Second Team All-Metro as a golfer twice … played four years of basketball at Washington … Graduated from UW with a degree in finance

Why he chose SPU – “I really enjoyed my time with the coaches and players. I feel SPU is an incredible spot for me to continue my basketball career and receive a high-quality education. Everyone was so welcoming and made it an easy choice.”

Personal – Son of Scott and Kristin … brother to Kari and Christian… favorite food is In-N-Out Burger ... favorite movie is Remember the Titans … least favorite movie is The Meg … favorite book is Greenlights … favorite sport to watch is basketball … favorite sports teams are the Seattle Mariners and the Seattle Seahawks … favorite athlete is Luis Castillo … dream car is a dark green Range Rover … wants to teleport
